##
##  AUTO GENERATED - DO NOT EDIT

###############################################################
###############################################################


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS applicationLog;
CREATE TABLE applicationLog
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    loggerName varchar(100),
    context varchar(100),
    message varchar(100),
    levelName char(5),
    levelCode int,
    threadName varchar(100),
    exceptionText varchar(100),
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index levelCode on applicationLog (levelCode, id);
create index createdUtcTs on applicationLog (createdUtcTs, id);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS applicationLogTrace;
CREATE TABLE applicationLogTrace
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    sequence int,
    value varchar(1000),
    logId int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS autoSignIn;
CREATE TABLE autoSignIn
(
    uid varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    lastTouchedUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS category;
CREATE TABLE category
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index projectName on category (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS depot;
CREATE TABLE depot
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    phone varchar(30),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index projectName on depot (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS download;
CREATE TABLE download
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index created on download (createdUtcTs);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email;
CREATE TABLE email
(
    uid varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    sentUtcTs datetime,
    subject varchar(100),
    fromAddress varchar(50),
    statusCode char(1),
    errorNotes varchar(100),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index status on email (statusCode, createdUtcTs);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS emailPart;
CREATE TABLE emailPart
(
    uid varchar(30),
    sequence int,
    typeCode char(1),
    attachmentName varchar(50),
    data mediumblob,
    lockVersion int,
    emailUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index email on emailPart (emailUid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS emailRecipient;
CREATE TABLE emailRecipient
(
    uid varchar(30),
    address varchar(50),
    typeCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    emailUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index email on emailRecipient (emailUid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS file;
CREATE TABLE file
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name varchar(100),
    path varchar(100),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    statusCode char(1),
    size int,
    partialSize int,
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hibernateCacheTest;
CREATE TABLE hibernateCacheTest
(
    uid varchar(30),
    data varchar(1000),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS invitation;
CREATE TABLE invitation
(
    uid varchar(30),
    typeCode char(1),
    statusCode char(1),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    closedUtcTs datetime,
    toEmail varchar(50),
    roleCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    fromUserUid varchar(30),
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS member;
CREATE TABLE member
(
    uid varchar(30),
    roleCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    userUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create unique index uid on member (uid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS memberSkill;
CREATE TABLE memberSkill
(
    uid varchar(30),
    sequence int,
    lockVersion int,
    memberUid varchar(30),
    skillUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create unique index memberSkill on memberSkill (memberUid, skillUid);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS passwordReset;
CREATE TABLE passwordReset
(
    uid varchar(30),
    email varchar(50),
    token varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    expirationUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index token on passwordReset (token);
create index expiration on passwordReset (expirationUtcTs);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS patch;
CREATE TABLE patch
(
    name varchar(50),
    installedUtcTs datetime,
    source text,
    primary key (name)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS performanceLog;
CREATE TABLE performanceLog
(
    id int AUTO_INCREMENT,
    name varchar(100),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    durationMs int,
    primary key (id)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index name on performanceLog (name);
create index createdUtcTs on performanceLog (createdUtcTs, name);

CREATE TABLE powerType
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index projectName on powerType (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS product;
CREATE TABLE product
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    categoryUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index projectName on product (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS project;
CREATE TABLE project
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index projectName on project (name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS region;
CREATE TABLE region
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index region on region (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS serverSession;
CREATE TABLE serverSession
(
    uid varchar(30),
    active char(1),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    closedUtcTs datetime,
    lastTouchedUtcTs datetime,
    version varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    userUid varchar(30),
    autoSignInUid varchar(30),
    currentProjectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS settings;
CREATE TABLE settings
(
    code int,
    someMessage varchar(100),
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (code)
) ENGINE = INNODB;

(
    uid varchar(30),

    projectUid varchar(30),

create index projectName on skill (projectUid, name);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user;
CREATE TABLE user
(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    email varchar(50),
    phone varchar(30),
    verified char(1),
    passwordSalt varchar(30),
    passwordHash varchar(40),
    timeZoneCode char(5),
    roleCode char(1),
    lockVersion int,
    lastProjectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create unique index email on user (email);


DROP TABLE IF EXISTS userActivation;
CREATE TABLE userActivation
(
    uid varchar(30),
    email varchar(50),
    token varchar(30),
    createdUtcTs datetime,
    expirationUtcTs datetime,
    lockVersion int,
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;
create index token on userActivation (token);
create index expiration on userActivation (expirationUtcTs);

(
    uid varchar(30),
    name varchar(50),
    lockVersion int,
    projectUid varchar(30),
    primary key (uid)
) ENGINE = INNODB;

(
